author: rwonly
msg: update 3.0-beta-SNAPSHOT to 3.0-beta-1-SNAPSHOT in all xml files

author: rgardler
msg: Configure M2E to handle specific lifecycle builds. In M2E 0.12 and earlier there were problems with sbuild lifecycle management. 0.13 implements a workaround for these (and boy is it ugly). See http://wiki.eclipse.org/M2E_plugin_execution_not_covered
I am assuming that this does not break the build for people with 0.12 but I am unable to test this.

author: rgardler
msg: remove the groupID and version numbers as they are the same as the parent values (Eclipse was failing to build with them in there)

author: sebb
msg: Quicker than checking each one when recreating pickle jar
Also shows which ones are not being used
